definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: Is 14:17) world, poet. synon. of [[אֶרֶץ]] (perh. orig. as productive, cf. [[יְבוּל]], [[בּוּל]], but this sense not clearly maintained; cf. also As. tabalu in êlî tabali, by land, ‖ êlî nâru, by water (river) Meissner:ZA 1889, iv. 3, 261, 263, 265 f. SASm:As. Letters iv. pl. viii. ix, 1. 33)—usu. abs. ´[[ת]] (no art.), cstr. Job 37:12, Pr 8:31; world, usu. ‖[[אֶרֶץ]]: 1Sa 2:8 (´[[י]] set ´[[ה]] on [[מְחֻקֵי אֶרֶץ]]), Is 14:21, Is 24:4, Is 34:1, Je 10:12 = Je 51:15, 1Ch 16:30 (= Ps 96:10 infr.) Job 34:13, Ps 19:5, Ps 77:19 = Ps 97:4, Ps 90:2, Ps 96:13 (+ [[עַמִּים]]), Ps 98:9 (+ id.); [[וְישְׁבֵי]] ´[[ת]] [[בָהּ]] Na 1:5, Ps 24:1; ´[[ישְׁבֵי ת]] Ps 33:8, Is 18:3 (‖[[שׁׂכְנֵי ארץ]]), Is 26:9, Is 26:18, La 4:12; [[וּמְלֽאָהּ]] ´[[ת]] Ps 89:12 (+ [[שָׁמַיִם]], cf. [[ארץ ומלאה]] Ps 24:1); [[אָָרְחָה]] ´[[עַל־פְּנֵי ת]] Job 37:12 upon the face of the world of earth (earthly world, the whole expanse of earth); [[אַרְחוֹ]] ´[[בְּת]] Pr 8:31; on the other hand ´[[עַפְרוֹת ת]] v:Pr 8:26; ´[[ת]] alone Job 18:18; other combin. [[וּמְלֽאָהּ]] ´[[ת]] Ps 50:12 (cf. Ps 89:12 supr.); ´[[פְּנֵי־ת]] Is 27:6 (cf. Job 37:12 supr.); ´[[מׂסְדוֹת ת]] 2Sa 22:16 foundations of the world = Ps 18:16, cf. ´[[תִּכּוֹן ת]] Ps 93:1, Ps 96:10 (= 1Ch 16:30); world as object of ´[[י]]'s judgment Ps 9:9 (‖[[לְאֻמִּים]]; v. also Ps 96:13 supr.), cf. [[וישׁבי בה]] ´[[ת]] Ps 98:7 (‖[[יַם]]), Is 13:11 (‖[[רשׁעים]]); as devastated by Babylonian conqueror Is 14:17 (‖[[עָרָיו]]).
